runs.comm: on the off stump line, Kallis pushes it to covers

dropped by Yusuf Pathan at backward point. It skidded on straight outside off, Kallis went for the cut and sliced it to right of backward point where Yusuf flings himself to the right but is not able to hold on to the difficult chance
turns in to the middle, pushed out
big swing and a miss. It was the quicker one outside off and Bosman went for the big booming drive but didn't connect
slower this time, pushed out to long-on
stretches across, goes down on his knee to sweep it from outside off to the square-leg boundary
on the off and middle stump line, it cuts it to go through the bat and pad gap and to Dhoni. Bosman was looking for the on-the-up drive but was beaten by the inward movement
moves in, Bosman goes for the swing to the on side but the ball rolls of the pad
gets across to deflect it through midwicket
outside off stump, mistimes it to mid-on
full in length, curving away from the off stump, driven to mid-off
Quick single just outside off stump, pushed out to point for a quick single.. after some hesitation they rush across. Jadeja fires a direct hit at the non-striker's end .. it was referred upstairs ..
on the middle and leg line, it straightens much to the surprise of Kallis who gets a leading edge to the off side
goes for the sweep but it rolls away off the pad
much slower, turns in from outside off, Kallis was looking to get outside leg and pushes it out to cover
skips down the track but is beaten in flight and squeezes it out to short third man region
punches this to right of Karthik at long-on
fires it full, swept away for a single
on the middle stump line, defended on the front foot
backs away but is cramped for room and jabs it to the off side
short in length outside off, flashed away to Karthik at third man
slower one on the off stump line, Kallis threatens to move outside leg before pressing across to flick it wide of midwicket
slightly short in length, Bosman mistimes the pull shot to midwicket
heaves it to the on side for a single
presses back  to wrist it past backward square-leg fielder
goes for the big hit but again mistimes it
slower, on the middle and leg, nudged past square-leg
Tame dismissal. He tried to rush out, Yusuf bowled it wider and Bosman reached out to carve a dolly to covers.
goes for the sweep but the ball flies off the edget to third-man region
flicks this one past square-leg
slower one on the middle stump line, short in length, Smith doesn't connect properly with the pull shot
short in length on the middle stump line, pulled away to deep square-leg fielder
Like Raina did, Smith retreats back inside the crease to lift the length delivery over midwicket
fullish on the legs, flicked to deep midwicket region
short in length and outside off stump, cut down to right of third man
stays back to clip it to midwicket for a single
quickish on off and middle, cut to short third man
quickish on the off stump line, stabbed to the off side
moves outside leg and goes for the square drive but edges it through the vacant slip region. Yusuf holds his head in agony
works it to the midwicket region for a single
turns to the middle stump line, dabbed to the off side
plays the sweep shot to get off strike
flighted outside off stump, driven to cover
goes back to push the skidding delivery to midwicket
moves outside leg and tries to play the big shot over covers but the ball skids away and goes off Dhoni's pad to short third man
goes for the sweep shot and edges it to  fine-leg region
plays the sweep to retain the strike
backs away to push the ball to point for a single
tries to step to the off side and play the slog sweep but doesn't connect well
gets forward to work this one to deep midwicket
goes down on his knee to play the sweep and drags the ball to fine-leg boundary
quicker and straighter, pushed out to cover
moves outside leg and hits this short-of-length delivery to sweeper cover
skids towards off and middle, pushed to the on side
moves down the track and drags it to deep midwicket
on the off stump line, driven to cover
moves outside leg and cuts towards deep backward point
goes down the track but Jadeja shortens the length, stabbed to the off side
moves outside leg stump and hits it hard but straight to sweeper cover
sweeps it to deep square-leg region where Jadeja makes a fine stop running to his left
drives this past the non striker
Finally. A shot. Smith goes down on his knee to slog sweep this over midwicket
moves outside leg stump and drives to cover
skids in towards middle stump, pushed out to cover
full delivery, driven down to long-on
driven back to Jadeja who threatens to flick it behind him to the stumps at the non-striker's end but doesn't. He should have as Kallis was struggling to get back
quick, straight and full, worked to the on side
backs away to the leg side, Jadeja follows him with a full delivery, punched to the of fside and Jadeja makes a lunging stop
really full, mistimed back to the bowler
fullish on the middle and leg, on driven to wide long-on .. throw comes in to Jadeja who doesn't collect cleanly .. overthrows
moves down the track and hits the low full toss to wide long-off boundary
wide outside off, Smith reaches out to cut it to sweeper cover
from round the stumps, flighted on the middle and leg, eased towards deep midwicket
on the middle and leg line, full, swept away to deep square-leg region
really full delivery on the middle, on driven wide of long-on
slower, on the middle, pushed out to midwicket for a quick single .. Raina with the throw .. had HArbhajan collected or had it hit the stumps, Kallis would have been out
on the middle stump line, pushed out to covers
pulls out the big slog sweep and connects superbly
dabbed away for a single
dropped by Dhoni It turned quickly away from Kallis who edges the defensive poke but Dhoni can't hold on
50 for Kallis .. on driven to long-on. But a strange innings this. the asking rate is climbing ever so steeply
hit down to deep midwicket for a single
moves down the track but the ball dips rapidly on him and he slices it to Raina at cover
Stop the press. Kallis plays a shot in anger. Whoa! A slog-swept six.
Wallop! He clears the front foot and launches this one over long-on
low and full, turned to Raina at midwicket
Run out of Smith missed It was hit down to Raina at cover and Smith was not even in the frame when the throw came but Harbhajan makes a mess of it.
really full delivery, on driven to long-on
Loverly hit. He moves outside and thumps this over long-off
fuller, pushed out to the off side
Smith is run out It was almost in the blockhole and Smith, dragged down to deep backward square-leg but he can't beat Praveen Kumar's accurate throw.
moves down the track, Jadeja shortens the length, pushed to point region
low full toss, hit down to long-off
Clatter! Thunderous hit. AB cleared the front foot and whacked the length delivery over midwicket boundary.
on the off stump line, goes for the big slog sweep and edges it to short fine-leg region
from wide of the crease, skids outside off, cut away for a single
Chawla drops it  on a length, Kallis goes down on his knee and tries to clear long-on but finds the man in the deep.
on the middle stump line, tries to paddle scoop and it bounds off Dhoni's body to the off side
charges down the track and lofts it over long-on. He just about clears the ropes. 53 from 19 balls
plays the paddle scoop this time to collect two runs behind Dhoni
slices this one to deep backward point region .. and he slips as he turns for the second run. So they settle for a single
clears the front foot and goes for the big hit but doesn't quite connect well .. the ball rolls to long-on
slower one on the off stump line, mistimed to the on side
slower one, AB swats it to long-on
really full delivery, hit down to long-on. Free hit coming up
shortish, mistimes the pull shot to midwicket
slower one on the middle, worked away to midwicket region
Boom. It was short in length and Albie smashes it over the wide midwicket boundary.
moves down the track and on drives to long-on
rushes down for the big hit again but ends up slicing it to cover where Harbhajan settles under the ball.
drags it short of length and AB drags it to wide long-on boundary. Thwack.
Smashed! He clears the front foot and slog sweeps it high over wide midwicket boundary.
drills this one to deep midwicket fielder.
Nehra fires it on the blockhole, AB edges it to the on side

fullish around off, sliced over Yuvraj at cover. They turn for the third run and the throw comes to Nehra who somehow contrives to deflect it to his groin! And he is in pain. Ouch! He is down on the ground now.
low full toss swinging away from the off stump, AB had moved outside leg and in trying to carve it over the off-side he slips and falls! More comic drama here!
low swinging full toss and AB carves it to left of long-on where Piyush takes a good running catch
on the middle stump line, dragged towards deep midwicket
full in length and it has been hit to the long-on boundary.
